description: This is an example of a world download entry
info: [c]This is an example map info page
Ok so this is just a page where the pack maker can dump a LOT of information about the map
Each individual string you add to the json file is turned into a new paragraph like this!. You can add §0c§1o§2l§3o§4u§5r§6s§7.§8.§9.§a.§b.§c.§d.§e.§f.§r And §l§n§oFormatting!§r §k\"Secret Text!\""
To add formatting you simply add the selector symbol "§" then any of the standard minecraft formatting codes
[c]You can also center a paragraph by adding "[c]" to the start of it (before any formatting)
